article_title: As Red States Balk, Medicaid Expansion Stops At 31 States

article_metadata.description: Republican-led states are balking at Medicaid expansion under the Affordable Care Act, which means 19 GOP dominated states will likely pass up 100 percent federal funding available to expand health benefits to their state's poor. Idaho decided against an executive order and legislative solution last week
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
